abstract: Unreasonable Institute in Boulder, Colo, offers six-week course to entrepreneurs, teaching commercial methods for tackling global issues; competition is stiff, with 300 people vying for 26 spots in 2011; many attendees praise program for its networking opportunities, and some have successfully launched businesses.
snippet: The Unreasonable Institute in Colorado offers a six-week course to entrepreneurs who want to make a profit while helping the world.
lead_paragraph: The Unreasonable Institute in Colorado offers a six-week course to entrepreneurs who want to make a profit while helping the world.

headline.main: Unreasonable, Maybe, but It’s on a Social Mission
headline.print_headline: Unreasonable, Maybe, but It’s on a Social Mission
headline.seo: Unreasonable Institute Teaches New Paths to Social Missions
